Name: Gem Deeps
About the game: Gem Deeps is an action-adventure platforming RPG with skill-based combat, hand-painted art, and deep lore. Fight Packs Of Enemies Every enemy has a weak spot. Hitting these spots grants you critical hits. Scoring critical hits is crucial when facing bulkier enemies. Level Up Your Abilities Find the right tactic for different types of enemies. Enhance that tactic and make a unique build in the Skill tree. Depending on your choices, you could rule over all enemies. Collect Underground Lore Listening to rumors of the Underworld may reveal some inside of this world lore as well as the local boss's weakness. Runed diary, on the other hand, explains the Underworld genesis story.
